#include<iostream>
#define m 1000000007
using namespace std;
#define gc() getchar_unlocked()
inline int fastread()
{
int i=0;
char c=gc();
while(c<48) c=gc();
while(c>47)
{
i=i*10+c-48;
c=gc();
}
return i;
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    long long j,*s;
    s=new long long [1000001];
    s[0]=0;s[1]=1;
    for(j=2;j<=1000000;j++) s[j]=(s[j-1]+s[j-2])%m;
    t=fastread();
    while(t--)
    {
        long long a,b,r,c;
        a=fastread();
        b=fastread();
        r=fastread();
        if(r==1) c=a;
        else if(r==2) c=b;
        else c=(a*s[r-2]+b*s[r-1])%m;
        cout<<c<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
